Plot - 
Bearing the tagline Ã¢â‚¬ËœJourney of the SoulÃ¢â‚¬â„¢, Gajaar tracks the life of a passionate and egoistic filmmaker Parth (Mandlekar) over a span of 18 days. These 18 days are no ordinary time span; they correlate to the grand pilgrimage Ã¢â‚¬ËœwariÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ to Lord VitthalÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s abode in Pandharpur, Maharashtra, undertaken by roughly 20 lakh devotees every year. These devotees, known as Ã¢â‚¬ËœwarkarisÃ¢â‚¬â„¢, walk from Alandi to Pandharpur chanting prayers and praises to the deity.Atheist Parth is approached by anthropology student Eric (Sonnenblick), an American who wants to make a film on the wari. After much persuasion, Parth is convinced by live-in girlfriend Geetali (Yash) to provide technical expertise for the film, which they shoot on location. The film tracks the positive transformation of Parth from an egoistic, self-centred man to a Vitthal faithful against the backdrop of the 18 adhyayas.
